mapper.insert: insert into wisdom(num, userId, subject, imageFilename, content, created, categoryNum) values(#{num},#{userId},#{subject},#{imageFilename},#{content},sysdate,#{categoryNum})
mapper.select:
select nvl(count(*),0) from wisdom w join member1 m on w.userId=m.userId
and selected='y'

select w.num,nickName, subject, imageFileName,categoryNum,hitCount,NVL(articleLikeCount, 0) articleLikeCount, to_char(created,'YYYY-MM-DD') created from wisdom w join member1 m on w.userId=m.userId left outer join( SELECT num, COUNT(*) articleLikeCount FROM WisdomLike GROUP BY num ) a ON w.num = a.num left outer join ( select imageNum,num,imageFileName from( select imageNum,num,imageFileName, row_number() over(partition by num order by imageNum asc) rank from WisdomImage )where rank=1 ) i on w.num=i.num
and selected='y'
categoryNum=${categoryNum}
ORDER BY num DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{rows} ROWS ONLY

select w.num, w.userId, subject, content, hitCount, created, articleLikeCount from wisdom w join member1 m1 on w.userId=m1.userId left outer join ( select num, count(*) articleLikeCount from wisdomLike group by num ) wl on w.num=wl.num where w.num=#{w.num}
mapper.insert: insert into WisdomImage(imageNum, num, imageFileName) values(WisdomImage_seq.nextval, #{num},#{imageFileName})
mapper.update: update wisdom set selected='y' where num=#{num}
mapper.select: select nvl(count(*),0) from wisdomLike where num=#{num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wisdomReply(replyNum, num, userId, content, answer, created) VALUES (wisdomReply_seq.NEXTVAL, #{num}, #{userId}, #{content}, #{answer}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: select nvl(COUNT(*), 0) from wisdomReply where num=#{num}

select r.replyNum, r.userId, userName, num, content, r.created, nvl(likeCount, 0) likeCount FROM WisdomReply r JOIN member1 m ON r.userId = m.userId LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT replyNum, COUNT(DECODE(replyLike, 1, 1)) likeCount FROM WisdomReplyLike GROUP BY replyNum ) c ON r.replyNum = c.replyNum WHERE num=#{num} AND r.answer=0 ORDER BY r.replyNum DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{rows} ROWS ONLY
mapper.insert: insert into wisdomReplyLike(replyNum, userId, replyLike) values (#{replyNum}, #{userId}, #{replyLike})
mapper.select: select count(DECODE(replyLike, 1, 1)) likeCount FROM wisdomReplyLike where replyNum = #{replyNum}
